Module kivakit.filesystems.github
Package com.telenav.kivakit.filesystems.github

Class GitHubFileSystemService

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.filesystems.github.GitHubFileSystemService
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.filesystem.spi.FileSystemService
public class GitHubFileSystemService extends Object implements com.telenav.kivakit.filesystem.spi.FileSystemService
Not public API

Implementation of the FileSystemService SPI to provide GitHub access through the KIVAKIT resource API. This service accepts FilePaths that begin with "github:" and it provides implementations of FileService and FolderService which are used by File and Folder to provide transparent access to file system services.

Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
